ProteinName	General transcription factor 3C polypeptide 6 (Transcription factor IIIC 35 kDa subunit) (TFIIIC 35 kDa subunit) (TFIIIC35) (Transcription factor IIIC subunit 6)
GeneName	GTF3C6 C6orf51 CDA020 NPD020
Length	213
Function	Involved in RNA polymerase III-mediated transcription. Integral, tightly associated component of the DNA-binding TFIIIC2 subcomplex that directly binds tRNA and virus-associated RNA promoters.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
